Comment.Text: Start the core MissionGiver conversation flow. If the Player moves out of range, end the conversation and play a goodbye line. If the conversation completes naturally, progress forward.
End Conversation if player walks away.
Use in place of "GetMissions" when testing without services.
Player uses Conversation Sticky Camera settings until Conversation ends

Set up MissionGiver Variables in local variables. In LaunchPreConversation, run a series of checks such as: Has the Player met this Mission Giver? Is the player Invited? Is the player currently on a mission for this Mission Giver? If the player is caught by one of these checks, a line will play and we will skip the core mission giver flow below.
Wait for the Mission Giver to reach one of two "WaitOnThreads": - the conversation is ready to end after the pre-convo - the conversation is ready to proceed to core mission giver conversation
Run the core Mission Giver conversation
